delete.error:
You cannot delete a workspace that has projects in it.
This workspace has { totalProjects, plural, one {# project} other {# projects} }. Delete the { totalProjects, plural, one {project} other {projects} } first.
delete.deleted_workspace: The workspace {{ var }} has been deleted.

members.title: Members
members.description_modal:
Once they have accepted the invitation, they will have access to the workspace within the limits of their assigned role.


Start typing a email or enter multiple addresses separated by a comma.

delete.leave_title: Are you sure you want to leave the workspace "{name}"?
delete.forbidden_existing_projects_self: You cannot leave the workspace while you are a member of the following projects: {names}
delete.workspace_will_be_deleted: The workspace will be permanently deleted
delete.sole_owner_succession: You are the sole owner of the workspace, you must designate someone to take this role
delete.existing_projects_succession_warning: This member is the sole owner of the following projects: {names}. You are going to become the new owner of those projects
delete.forbidden_existing_projects_other: This member is the sole owner of the following projects: {names}. Only an owner of the workspace can delete this member

placeholder.placeholder_title: You are not member of any workspace yet
placeholder.placeholder_text: Group your projects into workspaces. You decide if they match something as big as an organization or as personal as your pet projects.
